original_text: Has anyone promised to marry a woman? If he has not married her yet, he may go home too. If not, he may die in the battle. Then another man will marry her.’
korean_text: 여자와 약혼하고 그와 결혼하지 못한 자가 있느냐 그는 집으로 돌아갈지니 전사하면 타인이 그를 데려갈까 하노라 하고

sentences.original_text: Has anyone promised to marry a woman?
If he has not married her yet,
he may die in the battle.
Then another man will marry her.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 다른 남자가 그녀와 결혼할 것이다.'
